Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場
Entry.EnglishText: Tavern

Entry.JapaneseText: クルルルゥ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coo Coo

Entry.JapaneseText: 今のヒューマ……何だ……？ ……何があったんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-Who was that Huma...? ...Did something happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: ひ、ひぃぃ…… お助けを……!!
Entry.EnglishText: A-Ahhh!! S-Save me!

Entry.JapaneseText: な、何があっても 退かんぞ……！
Entry.EnglishText: I-I'm not retreating no matter what!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らは勇敢なる カレギアの兵士だからな……！
Entry.EnglishText: Because we're the valiant soldiers of Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界中に騒乱の火種がある。
Entry.EnglishText: Mayhem's happening all over the world!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我々カレギア軍は、 全土に警戒態勢を敷き、 万一の時に備えている。
Entry.EnglishText: We, the Callegean army, are on high alert throughout the land, ready for any eventuality!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出禁止だ。 室内に入ってろ！
Entry.EnglishText: Humas are not allowed outside! Go back indoors!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんかすごい勢いでミーシャが 港の方へ走ってったけど…… 誰かとケンカでもしたの？
Entry.EnglishText: I just saw Misha running away in full force towards the Harbor. Did he get in a fight?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャ、今度は畑の方へ 走ってったけど…… 何があったの？
Entry.EnglishText: Misha went towards the vegetable garden this time. Did something happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャっていつも とってもおとなしいのに…… さっきはなんかコワかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Misha's always been a quiet kid, yet earlier he seemed so scary...

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ あ、街の上の方に 行ったみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? Ahh... It looks like he went to the upper part of town this time...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか最近、みんな 怒りっぽくなってるのよね。 気のせいかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like everyone's so sensitive lately. Am I imagining it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール全体がイヤーな 感じなのよね……みんな、 ケンカばかりしてるし……
Entry.EnglishText: All everyone does here is fight. I don't like how this town feels.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、怖い顔したお兄さんが、 街の上の方に向かって 走ってったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Some man with a scary face just went to the upper part of town earlier...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ああいうの、 はやってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that kind of thing popular these days?

Entry.JapaneseText: ケンカするくらいなら、 ガジュマとヒューマは別々に 暮らせばいいと思うんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: It would be better to just separate Humas and Gajumas, if all they're going to do is fight.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何？ 何か落ちてくるの？
Entry.EnglishText: What? Did something fall?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか気持ち悪い…… とってもイヤな感じがする……
Entry.EnglishText: This feels disgusting... I... really hate this feeling...

Entry.JapaneseText: この街から船に乗れば、 首都バルカまで一直せーん……♪
Entry.EnglishText: If you take the boat from here, you'll be able to head straight to Balka...!♪

Entry.JapaneseText: のはずなんだけどね……
Entry.EnglishText: Well... that's how it's supposed to be.
